name: cloud-skills-assessment-backend
description: Backend for Cloud Skills Assessment application

scripts.deploy:dev: sam build && sam deploy --stack-name cloud-assessment-dev --parameter-overrides Environment=dev --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
